Name: The Watcher
About the game: An Arcade Stylized horror experience, in 2D style with action. Shoot and run your way through enemies as you find the fuses around the map to unlock the portal to the next world. Continue on the adventure as you try to figure out what is happening to you.
Meta Title: The Watcher: May 1, 2020, Markus D and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Watcher? Check out the release date (May 1, 2020), developer insights from Markus D, and a complete game summary.
